It also has a LARGE WINDOW that provides great light to the space and from which we have access to the TERRACE. The house is more than 15 m2 with beautiful views of the area and where we can place a table with chairs to enjoy the best stay. The very spacious KITCHEN has a countertop on both sides and furniture throughout, giving a large storage capacity.As we can see in the photographs, it is in perfect condition and fully equipped with all appliances. In addition, it has direct access to one of the TERRACES, which can be used as a CLOTHING ROOM, where you can store or use its space for another room. the House. It has THREE ROOMS.The MASTER BEDROOM, very spacious, with a very wide 4-section built-in wardrobe, with large space to have more closets in it and with large windows that provide great light to the room. The SECOND ROOM is also large in size, both with the possibility of placing a single or double bed.Also with very good light and a built-in two-section wardrobe, large storage capacity. The THIRD ROOM has a similar size, both with the capacity to place a single bed with a wardrobe and desk, also completely EXTERIOR. The main BATHROOM, fully equipped, in perfect condition, has a shower tray with screen and anti-slip floor, very modern and enough space to have more closets if necessary, in addition, it has direct ventilation. INDIVIDUAL NATURAL GAS HEATING with radiators in all rooms of the house in perfect condition, completely new BOILER, practically brand new, one of the few properties that have gas heating. The house has a STORAGE ROOM space, which is accessed from the outside, but with a large storage capacity in it. The URBANIZATION is very COMPLETE.Dispose of: TENNIS COURTS, PADEL COURTS, FROTON COURTS, BASKETBALL AND FOOTBALL COURTS, in addition, TWO LARGE SWIMMING POOLS with everything around CESPED, perfect to enjoy long summer months.It also has PRIVATE SECURITY 24 hours a day, many garden spaces and trees. The property also has the possibility of making it to the taste of the new owner, since it does not have load-bearing walls, they are only partitions, pillars and beams, although the property is in perfect condition, ready to move into. The environment is full of leisure areas, supermarkets, bars and restaurants with their attractive terraces.As well as several parks with children's areas and schools.One minute from the center of Guadarrama, an EXCELLENT place to live, perfect for families. The property is located just one minute from the intercity bus stop 680 and 688, both to Madrid in just one hour.Easy access to the road, in a few minutes, for any direction, to Madrid in 40 minutes. Do not hesitate to contact us to advise you on whatever you need, whether it is moving, renovations or financial advice. An exclusive and unique farm, better to see is to believe.. . We wait for you! This announcement is not binding and may contain errors. It is shown for informational purposes and is not contractual.

Spectacular stone villa in Guadarrama Spectacular stone house located in the Montepinar Urbanization on a plot of 1,088 m2 surrounded by nature, in one of the best locations in the village of Guadarrama.  With easy access from automated gate that leads us through a ramp to the large basement where the garage, a bathroom, laundry, large multipurpose open area and stairs that leads to the entrance floor. The house is accessed by a staircase of Galician granite, the same that is used for all the plating of the facade and exterior railings. We access a good sized hall that leads us to the large kitchen with pantry and office; a bedroom with bathroom and a large living-dining room with fireplace that also communicates with the kitchen and allows us to go outside to a comfortable porch from which to contemplate the mountain views.  From the wooden staircase we go up to the bedroom area all equipped with large fitted closets from floor to ceiling, folding wooden doors and fully clothed inside. Four bedrooms on this floor, two of them with en suite bathroom and the other two sharing a third bathroom and have access to a large terrace. Finally we go up to the attic, totally diaphanous, with sloping ceilings that do not affect the full use of the room for the use needed as a playroom... Highlight of the house its air conditioning.It has underfloor heating, air conditioning, all by natural gas. As well as drip irrigation throughout the garden and a cistern.  The construction materials are all noble with marble floors and wooden floors, doors, closet fronts and railings of walnut wood and veneered and exterior with Galician granite. Exterior carpentry of PVC wood tilt and turn windows and shutters with adjustable aluminum slats. Perimeter video surveillance system and exterior and interior alarm cameras. The house is located in the middle of nature and one of the highest points of the municipality of Guadarrama, in the Urbanization Montepinar, which we access from the old N-VI going up to the Alto del León. Guadarrama is a town of 15,600 inhabitants at the foot of the mountain range of the same name. It is 40 minutes away from the Moncloa transport interchange, in Madrid, by the A6 highway, several lines of public transport connect Guadarrama with intercity public transport lines connect Guadarrama with the capital and with other and other towns in the surrounding area. Within a radius of less than 10 km we find the shopping and leisure centers of the and leisure centers of the neighboring town of Collado Villalba, two general hospitals (Villalba and El Escorial) and several stations of lines C3, C8 and C10 of the suburban railroad network. Guadarrama has all the necessary facilities and services nearby (public schools (public and private schools, health center centers, health center, sports center, winter and summer swimming pools, commerce, etc.) and swimming pools, stores, etc.) and its renowned medium-stay hospital stands out. hospital. Surrounded by natural areas such as the Sierra de Guadarrama National Park and cultural sites such as the Escorial Monastery and close to other points of interest such as the main ski resorts in the Community of Madrid or the historic cities of Segovia and Ávila, it offers an unbeatable environment for daily life and work as well as for rest and relaxation.

Located at an altitude of 965 meters, the Guadarrama Urbanization is located just 2 km from the urban center of the town of Guadarrama, in the northwestern Sierra of Madrid. The urbanization, with an area of 32,000 m2. , is made up of 44 blocks, in each of which there are a total of 16 homes with different characteristics depending on their construction phase. The urbanization stands out for its large green areas, with various species of trees and shrubs, with a great distance between blocks, unusual in urbanizations of these characteristics and construction period. By bus, line 688 of the Larrea company, leaving from the Moncloa interchange (dársena 22), connects the urbanization with the Madrid capital in 45 minutes. Make an appointment without obligation! At Royal House we do not charge fees to the buyer, we advise you during the sales process and help you obtain tailor-made financing. Comprehensive rental management, with all the guarantees for owners and tenants, rental contract, non-payment insurance, security deposit, change of supplies. Our team stands out for its extensive experience, commitment and dedication, closeness and professionalism. Working with the objective of ensuring an effective buying and selling process. Royal House, by your side since 1992.

description: PATTY HOMES EXCLUSIVELY presents this beautiful independent house, built in a mountain style and views of the mountains of the Guadarrama mountain range. Comfortable, spacious and comfortable, it transmits from the moment you cross the door threshold the cozy feeling that we look for in a house in the mountains, but without abandoning the contact and level of modernity typical of the 21st century. Distributed over three floors, the ground floor has a hall, guest room or office, living-dining room, large and bright kitchen with office and terrace with direct access to the garden, as well as a guest toilet. On the upper floor, we find four large and comfortable bedrooms, one, the main one with an en-suite bathroom, a second full bathroom with a bathtub and each bedroom with its private terrace overlooking the garden that surrounds the house. Lower floor, games room, room with natural gas boiler, laundry room and ironing area, as well as a large garage for two or three cars, and storage area. Garden with above ground pool with saline chlorinator. The location of this property makes it unique as it faces a protected royal ravine, which guarantees open views, the tranquility of not having neighbors in front and privacy, which is also helped by the setbacks of the neighboring buildings, along with a grove of trees already mature that surrounds the perimeter of the farm. Well connected, as the access to the A 6 is immediate from the house. In addition to being perfectly served by bus lines and 688 to the Moncloa interchange in Madrid, to Guadarrama, Alpedrete, los Molinos and line 660, from Collado Villalba to El Escorial. All stops on these lines are located just seven hundred meters from the property. Two minutes by car would be the RENFE commuter train. Alpedrete – Mataespesa and Los Negrales stations, both with parking available to travelers. It has the main shopping centers nearby (Carrefour, Mercadona, Lidl, Aldi, the Planetocio shopping park and the Los Valles shopping center). Better VISIT. Extensive visiting hours. NEGOTIABLE PRICE.
